trans-unit.source: The StoreContentChangedEventArgs data includes the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A> associated with the event and the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction> of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction> or <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados de StoreContentChangedEventArgs incluem <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A>associados com o evento e <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction>do <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction>ou <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction>.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the StoreContentChangedEventArgs class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe StoreContentChangedEventArgs.

trans-unit.source: The annotation affected is specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A anotação afetada é especificada no <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Annotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: An action <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction"></xref> value that identifies the operation performed.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentAction"> </xref> efetuados valor que identifica a operação.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> that changed in the store.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> que foi alterado no arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The operation performed with the Annotation is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Action%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A operação de fazer com que a anotação é especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Action%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.StoreContentChangedEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"></xref> that changed in the store.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Annotation"> </xref> que foi alterado no arquivo.
